description: {{ENTITY}} CRUD API with routes, controller, and service
spec:
1. Verify {{ENTITY_LOWER}}Routes.ts exists at backend/src/routes/
2. Verify {{ENTITY_LOWER}}Controller.ts exists at backend/src/controllers/
3. Verify {{ENTITY_LOWER}}Service.ts exists at backend/src/services/
4. Verify GET /api/{{ENTITY_PLURAL_LOWER}} returns paginated list
5. Verify GET /api/{{ENTITY_PLURAL_LOWER}}/:id returns single record with relations
6. Verify POST /api/{{ENTITY_PLURAL_LOWER}} creates record (requires OPERATOR+ role)
7. Verify PUT /api/{{ENTITY_PLURAL_LOWER}}/:id updates record (requires OPERATOR+ role)
8. Verify DELETE /api/{{ENTITY_PLURAL_LOWER}}/:id soft-deletes record (requires ADMIN+ role)
9. Verify routes are registered in config/routes.ts
10. Verify proper error handling and validation
11. Verify role-based access control is enforced
title: {{ENTITY}} CRUD API
